[docs]def determineBlockSizes(npoints, totalBlockSize=4096):

  ndim = len(npoints)

  if (ndim < 1):
    return []
  elif (ndim == 1):
    return [ totalBlockSize ]

  n = 1 << ndim;

  if totalBlockSize < n: # unlikely
    blockSizes = ndim * [1]
    n = 1
  else:
    blockSizes = ndim * [2]
 
  while n < totalBlockSize:
    i_max = r_max = 0
    for i in range(ndim):
      r = float(npoints[i]) / blockSizes[i]
      if (r > r_max):
        i_max = i
        r_max = r
    blockSizes[i_max] *= 2
    n *= 2

  return blockSizes
